src:
Josep Guardiola Jawab Rumor Bakal Latih Klub Serie A: Mungkin, Ya!
07 Nov 2019, 13:58 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Josep Guardiola tidak menutup peluang untuk melatih klub Serie A di masa depan. Namun, Guardiola membantah kabar bahwa dia tertarik melatih Juventus pada awal musim 2019/2020 mendatang.
Guardiola sudah pernah meraih sukses di Spanyol sebagai pelatih Barcelona. Dia meraih hampir semua gelar yang diikuti. Guardiola juga mampu mendapat sukses saat melatih di Jerman bersama Bayer Munchen.
Sejak 2016 lalu, Guardiola pindah ke Inggris untuk bekerja di Manchester City. Hasilnya, Guardiola membawa The Citizen dua kali juara Premier League. Khusus di musim 2018/2019 lalu, Man City menyapu bersih gelar di level domestik.
Guardiola sudah pernah meraih juara di tiga liga top Eropa. Praktis, hanya satu gelar liga top yang belum pernah diraih Guardiola yakni Serie A. Nah, apakah Guardiola berminat untuk melatih di Serie A pada masa depan?.
text:
Josep Guardiola answers rumors about going to coach the Serie A club: Maybe, yes!
Nov 7 2019, 13:58 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Josep Guardiola does not rule out opportunities to train Serie A clubs in the future. However, Guardiola denied the news that he was interested in coaching Juventus at the start of the upcoming 2019/2020 season.
Guardiola has already had success in Spain as Barcelona coach. He won almost all the titles that were followed. Guardiola was also able to have success while training in Germany with Bayer Munchen.
Since 2016, Guardiola moved to England to work in Manchester City. The result, Guardiola brought The Citizen to two-time Premier League champions. Specifically in the last 2018/2019 season, Man City wiped out the title at the domestic level.
Guardiola has won in three of Europe's top leagues. Practically, only one top league title has never been won by Guardiola, namely Serie A. Now, is Guardiola interested in training in Serie A in the future?
